title: [Health] Widespread naloxone distribution via a community take-home program did not significantly impact opioid overdose rates in Hamilton County (Cincinnati, OH)

[Health] A study of 1296 randomly selected adults in 15 Belgian prisons finds distress was more common in women and during early stages. Also, having a history of mental disorder, low levels of perceived autonomy, safety, and social support were independently associated with experiencing distress.
